Container.Name: Portainer
Container.Description:
Portainer is a simple management solution for Docker. It consists of a web UI that allows you to easily manage your Docker containers, images, networks and volumes. [br][br]
[b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/mnt/user/appdata/portainer[/b] This is where Portainer will store it's data.[br] [b]/var/run/docker.sockr[/b] Portainer uses this to get Docker information from unRAID host.[br] [b]Port 9000[/b] Default WebUI port[br]
